3: ¿Jasche cäban chke chi xa uj je ta ne awaj cujchomax c'ut chi xa uj mes?
4: ¿La are ta pa a c'u'x chi rumal ri u ch'akatisaxic awib ruc' oyowal cätoli' ta can ri uwächulew o ri abaj tak caquiq'uex ta qui c'olbal?
5: Cächup na ri u chäj ri itzel winak, ri u k'ak' man cakapquen ta chic.
6: Ri u chäj ri cac'amow u be cachup na; man c'o ta chäj canicow ta na pa ri rachoch.
7: Man quebel ta puwi' ri cubano cac'amitaj na canok chupam ri kas u c'amibal.
8: Cäcoj na jun putzquiyibal pa ri u be chupam c'ut we putzquiyibal ri' caputzquiyitaj wi na.
9: Cäcoj na jun colob chquiwäch ri rakan, caximitaj c'u na ri u kul rakan.
10: Ri c'amibal c'utal ri' pa ri be che u c'amixic aretak coc'owic.
11: Xak xe'j rib pa apachique c'olbal; xe'j rib chi terenetal ri e u xo'l tak rakan.
12: Ri e u chuk'ab queq'uis na, u mac rech ri wi'jal; ri quiäkasakil xak eyetal rumal cäkaj puwi'.
13: Ri yabilal, u mia'l ri cämical ri sibalaj cäkaj chuwäch, nojimal cut'ubij ri u ti'jal.
14: Xukuje' boktajinak ri jamaril pa ri rachoch cacharchatex bic chuwäch ri ajawinel ri cojolxib.
15: Cät'ik k'ak' che ri rachoch; cajopix na asubre chquipam tak ri rulew.
16: Jacha' jun che' ri e chaki'jarinak tak ri u c'amal ri e yututurinak tak ri e u k'ab.
17: Ri u nataxic cachupisax cho ri uwächulew man canatax ta chi c'ut ri u bi'.
18: Quesax bic jawije' c'o wi ri sakilal carokix chupam ri k'ekumalil; quesax na bic chuwäch we uwächulew ri'.
19: Man quecanaj ta rija'lil chupam ri u tinimit; man c'o ta jun aj uwo rachoch cac'asi' ta canok.
20: Aretak ri e aj elebal k'ij xukuje' ri aj u kajebal k'ij caquetamaj ri xataklebej, quexibitaj na, e nojinak che nimalaj xibin ib.
21: Je u q'uisic wa' ri u c'aslemal ri banal etzelal, ri winak ri caretzelaj u wäch ri Dios.”
